meanings: (필요한 것을) look[search] for, obtain, (formal) seek; (찾아내다) find (out); (얻다) get
(조언·양해·용서 등을) ask (for), request, (formal) seek, turn to (=청하다)
(위험에서) rescue[save] (sb from sth), (곤경에서) (formal) extricate (sb from sth)

meanings.meaning: the principle of saving the greater number

vlive.korean: 누구 구해야 돼? Who should I save? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [설아] 전지적 설아 시점👀💕 EP.02
저를 구해야 될 것 같은 느낌? - 그러니까요. I had to save myself. - I know. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : <달빛궁궐> 스팟라이브 ' Spot Live'
vlive.english: I had to save myself. - I know.

vlive.korean: 저 빗자루 구해야 될 것 같대요. 맞죠? I think I need to find a broom, right? 듣기 View video MELODYDAY : MelodyDay '유민의 할로윈 메이크업 (Halloween Make up)'
vlive.english: I think I need to find a broom, right?

vlive.korean: 지구를 구해야 하는데 생각 있으신가요? We must save the planet. Any ideas? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 부(산)이앱
vlive.english: We must save the planet. Any ideas?

vlive.korean: [두 포로 등판 완료] 그런데 누구를 구해야 돼요? [Two captives took the mound] Who should we save? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7의 하드캐리 5화 (GOT7's Hard Carry ep.5)
vlive.english: [Two captives took the mound] Who should we save?

examples.korean: You simply have to get a new job. 발음듣기 당신은 그저 새 직장을 구해야 해요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You simply have to get a new job. 발음

examples.korean: I think it’s time we sought legal advice. 발음듣기 우리가 법률적 조언을 구해야 할 때라고 생각한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I think it’s time we sought legal advice. 발음

examples.korean: Somehow or other I must get a new job. 발음듣기 어떻게 해서든 내가 새 직장을 구해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Somehow or other I must get a new job. 발음

examples.korean: I’m going to have to find a new apartment pretty soon. 발음듣기 나는 꽤 빨리 새 아파트를 구해야 할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m going to have to find a new apartment pretty soon. 발음

examples.korean: You must ask permission for all major expenditure. 발음듣기 모든 주요 경비에 대해서는 허락을 구해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You must ask permission for all major expenditure. 발음
